Top Secret Agent

Use the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Top Secret Agent[COLOR_REVERT] to explore enemy territory and perform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Espionage Missions[COLOR_REVERT]. This spy unit start with better promotion then normal Agent and Special Agent and can perform paradrop.
TEXT.French: Utilisez l'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Agent Top Secret[COLOR_REVERT] pour explorer le territoire ennemi et réaliser des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Missions d'Espionnage [COLOR_REVERT]. Cet espion démarre avec des promotions supérieures aux autres agents, et peut être parachuté.

TEXT.English: 57th Infantry Regiment

The 57th Infantry Regiment (Turkish: 57 nci Piyade Alayi or Elli Yedinci Piyade Alayi) or simply 57th Regiment (Turkish: 57 nci Alay or Elli Yedinci Alay) was established on February 1, 1915 in Tekirdag (Rodosto) and received its regimental colours (sancak) on February 22, 1915. The regiment's command was given to Yarbay Hüseyin Avni Bey (Ariburnu) on February 23, and the regiment departed to Çanakkale and arrived at Eceabat (Maydos) on February 25. After relocating the Bigali Village on March 26, 1915 they trained until April 24 under the command of Lt. Colonel Hüseyin Avni.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]57th Infantry Regiment[COLOR_REVERT] is a Turkish unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]57ème Regiment d'Infanterie[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Turque unique.

TEXT.English: Jet Tactical Bomber

The Jet Tactical Bomber is an American single-seat, twin-engine jet aircraft developed by Fairchild-Republic for the United States Air Force to provide close air support (CAS) of ground forces by attacking tanks, armored vehicles, and other ground targets, also providing a limited air interdiction role. It is the first U.S. Air Force aircraft designed exclusively for close air support.[PARAGRAPH:1]The A-10 has superior maneuverability at low speeds and altitude, thanks to straight, wide wings with downturned "droop" wing tips. These also allow short takeoffs and landings, permitting operations from rugged, forward airfields near front lines. The aircraft can loiter for extended periods of time and operate under 1,000 feet (300 m) ceilings with 1.5-mile (2.4 km) visibility. It typically flies at a relatively slow speed of 300 knots (345 mph or 555 km/h), which makes it a much better candidate for the ground-attack role than fast fighter-bombers, which often have difficulty targeting small and slow-moving targets.[PARAGRAPH:1]The A-10 is exceptionally hardy, to the point that some service men refer to it as 'an airborne tank.' Its strong airframe can survive direct hits from armor-piercing and high-explosive projectiles up to 23 mm. The aircraft has triple redundancy in its flight systems, with mechanical systems to back up double-redundant hydraulic systems. This permits pilots to fly and land when hydraulic power or part of a wing is lost. Flight without hydraulic power uses the manual reversion flight control system; this engages automatically for pitch and yaw control, and under pilot control (manual reversion switch) for roll control. In manual reversion mode, the A-10 is sufficiently controllable under favorable conditions to return to base and land, though control forces are much higher than normal. The aircraft is designed to fly with one engine, one tail, one elevator and half a wing torn off.[PARAGRAPH:1]Although the A-10 can carry a considerable weight of disposable stores, its primary built-in weapon is the 30 mm GAU-8/A Avenger Gatling gun. One of the most powerful aircraft cannons ever flown, it fires large depleted uranium armor-piercing shells. In the original design, the rate of fire was selectable, 2,100 rounds per minute in the low setting, or 4,200 in the high setting. Later this was changed to a fixed rate of 3,900 rounds per minute. Another commonly used weapon is the AGM-65 Maverick air-to-surface missile, with different variations for either electro-optical (TV-guided) or infra-red targeting. The Maverick allows targets to be engaged at much greater ranges than the cannon, a safer proposition in the face of modern anti-aircraft systems. Other weapons include cluster bombs and Hydra rocket pods.
TEXT.Polish: Fairchild A-10/OA-10 Thunderbolt II nazwa kodowa Warthog (ang. Guziec), Pierwszy amerykański samolot bliskiego wsparcia sił lądowych Sił Powietrznych Stanów Zjednoczonych. A-10 jest jednomiejscowym, efektywnym i bardzo odpornym na uszkodzenia, napędzanym dwoma silnikami turbowentylatorowymi samolotem szturmowym przeznaczonym do niszczenia czołgów, pojazdów opancerzonych i innych celów naziemnych. Nazwa Thunderbolt (ang. piorun) została nadana tej maszynie na cześć P-47 Thunderbolt, samolotu myśliwsko-bombowego z II wojny światowej.

TEXT.English: A-10 Thunderbolt is modern era bomber with a range of 10. It is a land based aircraft and it can attack land units (and sea units but not very effectively), and they can weaken enemy fortifications. Causes collateral damage.
TEXT.French: L'A-10 Thunderbolt est un bombardier de l'ère moderne, avec une portée de 10. Rattaché à un aéroport, il peut attaquer les unités terrestre (et dans une moindre mesure les unités navales), réduire les fortifications de l'ennemi et causer des dégâts collatéraux.
TEXT.Spanish: El Bombardero táctico a reacción es un bombardero de la época moderna con un alcance de 10. Es una aeronave con base en tierra, y puede atacar a unidades terrestres (y a unidades acuáticas, pero con poca efectividad), y pueden debilitar las defensas enemigas. Causa daños colaterales.
TEXT.Polish: Bombowiec A-10 Thunderbolt jest nowoczesnym bombowcem a jego zasięg wynosi - 10. Bombowce te mogą atakować jednostki lądowe (oraz jednostki morskie tylko, ze zmniejsza siłą rażenia). A-10 Thunderbolt może powodowac masowe obrażenia oraz osłabiac fortyfikacje wroga.

TEXT.English: Aardvark
Abaoji

Abaoji was a Khitan leader and founder of what would become the Liao Dynasty (907-926). Abaoji also took the Chinese name Yi some sources suggest that the surname Yelu was adopted during his lifetime, though there is no unanimity on this point. Abaoji was born on 872 in Southern Mongolia and had a turbulent childhood. His grandfather was killed in a conflict between tribes, and his father and uncles fled. Yel Abaoji was hidden by his grandmother for his safety. He became khagan of the Khitan on February 29, 907, and was subsequently enthroned as emperor of the Khitan in 916, proclaiming his own era name. He died on September 6, 926. He was responsible for the conquest and unification of all of Inner Mongolia, Northern China, and Southern Manchuria. Once the Khitan Empire became the Liao dynasty in 942, he was posthumously considered an emperor of the Liao.
Abdullah II

Abdullah II bin Al-Hussein has been the King of Jordan since he ascended the throne on 7 February 1999 upon the death of his father King Hussein. He is a member of the Hashemite family, which has ruled Jordan since 1921 and claims to be descended from the Islamic prophet Muhammad. Abdullah was born to Hussein and his second wife, the British-born Princess Muna al-Hussein. He was named crown prince shortly after his birth. King Hussein transferred the title to his own brother, Hassan, in 1965, only to return it to Abdullah in 1999. He is married to Queen Rania of Jordan, who is of Palestinian origin. In 1993, he assumed command of Jordan's special forces and became a Major General in May 1998. Emir of Dubai, Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, is his brother-in-law, through Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum's marriage to Haya bint Al Hussein.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Abdullah II[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Abdul Razak Hussein

Tun Abdul Razak Hussein was the second Prime Minister of Malaysia, ruling from 1970 to 1976. Tun Razak was the Prime Minister responsible in setting up Barisan Nasional, which is the ruling coalition of political parties that have held power in Malaysia till today, taking over from its predecessor, the Alliance. He is also renowned for launching the Malaysian New Economic Policy (MNEP).
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Abdul Razak Hussein[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Abdul Razak Hussein[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité héroïque.

TEXT.English: Ablai Khan

Wali-ullah Abul-Mansur Khan better known as Ablai Khan was a Kazakh khan of the Middle jüz. Born as Wali-ullah Abul-Mansur Khan, Ablai Khan belonged to the senior branch of descendants of the 15th century founder of the Kazakh state, Janybek Khan. In the first half of the 18th century, Ablai Khan proved to be a talented organizer and commander as he headed detachments of the Kazakh militia fighting the Dzungars. He participated in the most significant battles against the Dzungars from the 1720s to the 1750s, for which he was declared a "batyr" ("hero") by the people.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ablai Khan[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Abu Kariba

Tub'a Abu Kariba As'ad (Abu Kariba) was the Himyarite king of Yemen. He ruled Yemen from 390-420 CE. Abu Kariba is commonly cited as the first of several kings of Arabia to convert to Judaism. While most sources agree that Abu Kariba was the first of the Himyarite kings to convert to Judaism, the circumstances of his conversion are immersed in myth and legend. According to the traditional account, Abu Kariba undertook a military expedition to eliminate the growing influence of Byzantium in his northern provinces. His forces reached Medina, which was then was known as "Yathrib". Not meeting any resistance, they passed through the town, leaving one of the king's sons behind as governor of the town. A few days later, however, the people of Yathrib killed their new governor, the king's son. Upon receiving the news, the king turned his troops back to avenge his son's death, and destroy the town. He ordered that all palm trees around the town be cut down, because the trees were the main source of the town's inhabitants' income, and then laid siege to the town.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Abu Kariba[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Acalapua

The Chim were known to have worshipped the moon and it is believed they considered it more powerful than the Sun, worshipped by the Inca. Offerings played an important role in religious rites. A common object for offerings, as well as one used by artisans, was the shell of the Spondylus shellfish, which live only in the warm coastal waters off present-day Ecuador. It was associated with the sea, rainfall, and fertility. Spondylus shells were also highly valued and traded by the Chim.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Acalapua[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
ACV
ACV SAM

Autonomous Combat Vehicle (ACV) is a vehicle that operates while in contact with the ground and without an onboard human presence. ACVs can be used for many applications where it may be inconvenient, dangerous, or impossible to have a human operator present. Generally, the vehicle will have a set of sensors to observe the environment, and will either autonomously make decisions about its behavior or pass the information to a human operator at a different location who will control the vehicle through teleoperation. The ACV is the land-based counterpart to unmanned aerial vehicles and remotely operated underwater vehicles. Unmanned robotics are being actively developed for both civilian and military use to perform a variety of dull, dirty, and dangerous activities.

Autonomous Combat Vehicle (ACV) is a vehicle that operates while in contact with the ground and without an onboard human presence. ACVs can be used for many applications where it may be inconvenient, dangerous, or impossible to have a human operator present. Generally, the vehicle will have a set of sensors to observe the environment, and will either autonomously make decisions about its behavior or pass the information to a human operator at a different location who will control the vehicle through teleoperation. The ACV is the land-based counterpart to unmanned aerial vehicles and remotely operated underwater vehicles. Unmanned robotics are being actively developed for both civilian and military use to perform a variety of dull, dirty, and dangerous activities.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ACV[COLOR_REVERT] - The first of the Hi-Tech units line. Weak, but ideal against clone units.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]l'ACV[COLOR_REVERT] - La première des unités Hi-tech. plutôt Faible, mais idéal contre les clones.

TEXT.English: Adelard Godbout

Joseph-Adelard Godbout was an agronomist and politician in the Canadian province of Quebec. He served as the 15th Premier of Quebec briefly in 1936, and again from 1939 to 1944. He was also leader of the Parti Libéral du Québec (PLQ). World War II created the opportunity that Godbout needed to make a political comeback. An early provincial general election was called in 1939 and federal Cabinet member Ernest Lapointe, the Quebec lieutenant of Prime Minister Mackenzie King, took the stump for Godbout. He guaranteed that no one would face conscription if voters supported the Liberals. Lapointe would die of cancer in 1941.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Adelard Godbout[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Adventurer
TBD
Adventurer is fast moving and more skilled explorer unit. Great for exploring new continents or enemy territories.
TEXT.French: L'Aventurier est la plus rapide et la plus évoluée des unités d'exploration. Idéale pour explorer de nouveau continents ou le territoire ennemi.
TEXT.Spanish: El Aventurero es una unidad de exploración rápida y experimentada. Es excelente para explorar nuevos continentes o el territorio enemigo.
TEXT.Polish: Awanturnik jest to jednostka zwiadowcza, która względem poprzedniczek jest znacznie szybsza i bardziej doswiadczoną jednostką. Doskonale nadaje się do odkrywania nowych kontynentów oraz wrogich terenów.

TEXT.English: Adze Warrior
Luban Unique Culture Unit.
The Adze Warrior a Luban Unit. Skilled in the arts of ambush, it gets multiple first strikes and is a terror to its foes.

TEXT.English: Aegis Cruiser

The term "Aegis cruiser" loosely describes a cruiser carrying an Aegis anti-missile system created by the United States in the late twentieth century. The US Navy had long been developing an anti-missile vessel, and the sinking of the British destroyer HMS 'Sheffield' by a single French Exocet missile during the Falklands War only increased their efforts.[PARAGRAPH:1]Aegis cruisers are typically armed with anti-missile missiles, as well as two enormous "Vulcan" gatling guns, "last ditch" weapons designed to destroy close-in missiles that evaded the cruiser's defensive missiles. The ships are also equipped with anti-aircraft weaponry and some anti-submarine defenses, as well. In addition, the cruisers often carry offensive missiles which can be deployed against naval or land-based targets. Aegis cruisers are most usually deployed as escort vessels, protecting the highly vulnerable carrier groups from missile and air assault.
TEXT.French: Le terme de "Croiseur Aegis" désigne un croiseur armé du système anti-missiles Aegis, conçu par les Etats-Unis à la fin du vingtième siècle. La marine américaine a toujours cherché à doter sa flotte de vaisseaux anti-missiles. Le torpillage du destroyer britannique HMS Sheffield par un simple missile Exocet français lors de la guerre des Malouines les incita à redoubler d'efforts.[PARAGRAPH:1]Les croiseurs Aegis sont généralement dotés de missiles anti-missiles ainsi que de deux énormes canons "Vulcain", censés pouvoir détruire les missiles qui auraient échappé à la surveillance des radars. Ces vaisseaux sont également équipés de tout un arsenal anti-aérien et anti-sous-marins. En outre, les croiseurs sont souvent pourvus de missiles d'attaque qui peuvent être déployés contre des cibles navales ou terrestres. Les croiseurs Aegis sont le plus souvent utilisés pour servir d'escorte aux transporteurs.
TEXT.German: Als "Aegis-Kreuzer" bezeichnet man einen Ende des 20. Jahrhunderts in den Vereinigten Staaten eingesetzten Kreuzer, der mit einem Aegis-Kampfsystem ausgestattet ist. Die U.S. Navy hatte bereits lange an der Entwicklung eines Schiffes mit Warn- und Feuerleitsystem gearbeitet, als diese Bemühungen nach der Versenkung des britischen Zerstörers HMS 'Sheffield' während des Falklandkrieges durch eine einzige französische Exocet-Rakete noch stärker vorangetrieben wurden.[PARAGRAPH:1]Aegis-Kreuzer sind normalerweise mit Abfangraketen sowie zwei riesigen "Vulcan"-Gatlingkanonen ausgestattet - also Waffen, die als allerletztes Mittel eingesetzt werden, um anfliegende Raketen zu zerstören, die zuvor den Abwehrraketen des Kreuzers ausweichen konnten. Darüber hinaus sind die Schiffe mit Flugabwehrwaffen sowie einigen U-Boot-Abwehrwaffen und häufig auch mit Angriffsraketen ausgerüstet, die sowohl gegen land- als auch seegestützte Ziele eingesetzt werden können. Aegis-Kreuzer dienen in aller Regel als Begleitschiffe für äußerst angreifbare Flugzeugträgerflotten, die vor Raketen- und Luftbombardierungen geschützt werden müssen.
TEXT.Italian: Il termine Incrociatore Aegis descrive in genere un incrociatore con un sistema antimissili Aegis, creato nel tardo ventesimo secolo dagli Stati Uniti. La marina americana studiava da molto un vascello antimissile e l'affondamento del cacciatorpediniere britannico HMS 'Sheffield' da parte di un singolo missile francese Exocet, durante la guerra delle Falkland, non fece che far aumentare i loro sforzi.[PARAGRAPH:1]Gli incrociatori Aegis sono solitamente armati con missili antimissile, oltre che con due enormi "Vulcan", mitragliatrici gatling, che fungono da ultima speranza nel caso in cui il missile in arrivo riesca a evitare quelli difensivi. Le navi sono anche equipaggiate con armi antiaeree e alcune difese antisommergibile. In più questi incrociatori hanno spesso missili d'attacco che possono essere utilizzati contro bersagli navali o terrestri. Gli incrociatori Aegis vengono usati la maggior parte delle volte come vascelli di scorta per proteggere da attacchi aerei e missilistici le portaerei.
TEXT.Spanish: El término "crucero Aegis" describe en términos generales a un crucero que transporta un sistema antimisiles Aegis, creado por los Estados Unidos a finales del s. XX. La armada de los EE. UU. pasó mucho tiempo desarrollando un buque antimisiles, y el hundimiento del destructor británico HMS "Sheffield" a causa del impacto de un único misil francés Exocet durante la guerra de las Malvinas no hizo más que acrecentar sus esfuerzos.[PARAGRAPH:1]Los cruceros Aegis suelen ir armados con misiles antimisil, así como con dos enormes cañones Gatling "Vulcan", armas que se usan como último recurso para destruir misiles cercanos que han burlado a los misiles de defensa del crucero. Los buques también cuentan con armamento antiaéreo y defensas antisubmarinos. Además, dichos cruceros a menudo cuentan con misiles de ataque que pueden lanzarse contra objetivos navales o terrestres. Los cruceros Aegis acostumbran a usarse como naves de escolta para proteger a los vulnerables grupos de portaaviones de incursiones aéreas o de misiles.
TEXT.Polish: Termin "Krążownik Aegis" odnosi się do krążownika wyposażonego w system atypociskowy o nazwie Aegis. Pierwszy taki okręt został skonstruowany przez Stany Zjednoczone u schyłku XX wieku.[PARAGRAPH:1]Krążowniki Aegis oprócz rakiet są zwykle wyposażone także w działa obrotowe typu Vulcan i inne bronie zaprojektowane w celu obrony przed pociskami, którym uda się jakoś ominąć systemy antyrakietowe. Pozostałym wyposażeniem są armatki przeciwlotnicze i uzbrojenie przeciw łodziom podwodnym. Mogą one także transportować i wystrzeliwać pociski dalekiego zasięgu przeciwko celom morskim lub lądowym.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aegis Cruisers[COLOR_REVERT] carry up to 2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missiles[COLOR_REVERT]. They have a 50% chance to intercept [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aircraft[COLOR_REVERT], and they can [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cities (-10%/Turn).

Tienen una probabilidad del 50% de interceptar [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]aeronaves[COLOR_REVERT], y son capaces de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bombardear[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] ciudades (-10%/turno).
TEXT.Polish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Krążowniki Aegis[COLOR_REVERT] potrafią transportować do 2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pocisków[COLOR_REVERT]. Mają 50% szansy na przechwycenie [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Samolotu[COLOR_REVERT] i potrafią [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bombardować[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] miasta (-10%/turę).

TEXT.English: Afonso Henriques

Afonso I, also known as Afonso Henriques, was the first king of Portugal (113985), who conquered Santarm and Lisbon from the Muslims (1147) and secured Portuguese independence from Leon (1139). By victory in the Battle of Ourique (1139) he was able to impose tribute on his Muslim neighbours; and in 1147 he further captured Santarm and, availing himself of the services of passing crusaders, successfully laid siege to Lisbon. He carried his frontiers beyond the Tagus River, annexing Beja in 1162 and vora in 1165; in attacking Badajoz, he was taken prisoner but then released. He married Mafalda of Savoy and associated his son, Sancho I, with his power. By the time of his death he had created a stable and independent monarchy.
TEXT.Polish: Alfons I, znany bardziej jako Afonso Henriques, nazywany Zdobywcą (ur. 25 lipca 1109, zm. 6 grudnia 1185)? pierwszy król Portugalii, od 26 lipca 1139. Syn Henryka Burgundzkiego, hrabiego Portugalii i Teresy de Leon. Początkowo władzę w imieniu małoletniego hrabiego sprawowała jego matka, jednak Alfons, pomimo młodego wieku, posiadał odmienne poglądy polityczne, mając zaledwie dwanaście lat stanął po stronie politycznego przeciwnika swojej matki, arcybiskupa Bragi, za co oboje zostali wygnani z kraju. Powrócił do hrabstwa po skończeniu 14 roku życia (w średniowieczu oznaczało to wkroczenie w wiek męski), gdzie stanął na czele rebelii przeciwko swojej matce. Po pokonaniu wojsk kochanka swojej matki, Fernando Peresa de Trava w bitwie pod Sao Mamede, wygnał z kraju dotychczasową regentkę. Prowadził walki przeciwko Maurom. W czasie tych walk, po bitwie pod Ourique w 1139 koronował się na króla. Jednak Stolica Apostolska uznała jego tytuł dopiero po 40 latach starań, w 1179. Przez ten czas król budował nowe klasztory, sprowadził do Portugalii cystersów. Dla celów rekonkwisty stworzył rycerski zakon Avis, którego pierwszym mistrzem był jego naturalny syn Piotr Alfons. W 1147 odbił z rąk Arabów Lizbonę, a podczas wojny w latach 1158-1166 prowincję Alentejo. W 1184 oddał realną władzę swojemu synowi Sancho.

TEXT.English: The Portuguese military hero is [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Afonso Henriques[COLOR_REVERT]. Available in the medieval era, he starts off with a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Veteran[COLOR_REVERT] in his retinue. He can be built once [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Literature[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT] are researched.
