Although headhunting and cannibalism have been practically eradicated, in the past they were practised in many parts of the country as part of rituals related to warfare and taking in enemy spirits or powers. For example, in 1901, on Goaribari Island in the Gulf of Papua, a missionary, Harry Dauncey, found 10,000 skulls in the island's Long Houses. According to the writer Marianna Torgovnick, "The most fully documented instances of cannibalism as a social institution come from New Guinea, where head-hunting and ritual cannibalism survived, in certain isolated areas, into the Fifties, Sixties, and Seventies, and still leave traces within certain social groups".
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Papuan Cannibal[COLOR_REVERT] a Papuan Unit. It starts with a free Woodsman promotion.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannibals Papous[COLOR_REVERT] ont une connaissance de la forêt innée. Ils bénéficient de la promotion forestier
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]cannibale Papuano[COLOR_REVERT] inizia con la promozione gratuita Taglialegna I.
TEXT.Polish: Papuasi - autochtoniczna ludność Nowej Gwinei, liczebność: ok. 7 milionów, pierwotna kultura materialna (nie znali pisma, posługiwali się kamiennymi narzędziami). Ludność czarnoskóra (rasa negroidalna). Charakteryzują się wełniastymi włosami, czarnymi lub rudymi, oraz sklepionym nosem. Posługują się językami papuaskimi oraz językiem kreolskim powstałym na bazie angielskiego zwanym tok pisin. Do niedawna wśród Papuasów praktykowany był kanibalizm wywołujący kuru.

TEXT.English: Paratrooper
Park Ranger
The Park Ranger is a person who protects areas of wilderness from construction. This can be good in some cases, and wasteful in others.
TEXT.Italian: Il guardiaparco è una persona che protegge le riserve naturali; questo può essere sia un bene sia uno spreco.
TEXT.Polish: Leśniczy - pracownik instytucji Państwowe Gospodarstwo Leśne Lasy Państwowe. Jest pracownikiem Służby Leśnej w nadleśnictwie. Leśniczy jest podwładnym nadleśniczego i przełożonym podleśniczego. Sprawuje opiekę nad powierzonym mu leśnictwem, w którego skład wchodzą lasy należące do Skarbu Państwa jak również mogą to być lasy prywatne powierzone do prowadzenia przez starostę.

TEXT.English: The Park Ranger is a worker who can kill animals and reduce pollution, but only make natural improvements.
TEXT.French: Le Park Ranger est un Ouvrier qui peut tuer des animaux et réduire la pollution, mais seulement apporter des améliorations naturelles.
TEXT.Italian: Il guardiaparco è un lavoratore in grado di uccidere animali e ridurre l'inquinamento; può anche costruire alcuni miglioramenti legati alla natura.
TEXT.Polish: Leśniczy chroni przyrodę i obniża zanieczyszczenie w miastach.

TEXT.English: Parrot

This is the generic Parrot. It represents the parakeets like the budgerigar, flightless parrots like the New Zealand Kakapo and all the glorously coloured parrots and parakeets of the tropics around the world.
TEXT.Polish: Papugowe (Psittaciformes) - rząd ptaków z podgromady ptaków nowoczesnych Neornithes. Najliczniejsze w Ameryce Południowej i Australii. Ptaki te charakteryzują się obecnością: masywnego i hakowato zakończonego dzioba; nabrzmiałą woskówką u nasady dzioba (u większości gatunków); górną szczęką ruchomą względem czaszki; grubym, mięsistym językiem.

TEXT.English: Partisan

A partisan is a member of an irregular military force formed to oppose control of an area by a foreign power or by an army of occupation. The term can apply to the field element of resistance movements that opposed German rule several countries during World War II, or those who after the war fought the Soviet Union's Communist rule in Eastern Europe. (Original mod by GIR and Stolenrays.)
TEXT.German: Ein Partisan (von italienisch partigiano Parteigänger) ist ein bewaffneter Kämpfer, der nicht zu den regulären Streitkräften eines Staates gehört. (Original mod by GIR and Stolenrays.)
TEXT.Polish: Partyzant (wł. partigiano = stronnik)? żołnierz nieregularnych oddziałów prowadzących walki oraz działania dywersyjne na terenach zajętych przez wroga.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Partisan[COLOR_REVERT] Units will Spawn within the City Radius of an captured City.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Partisans[COLOR_REVERT] apparaissent dans le rayon d'exploitation d'une ville capturée.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Partisanen[COLOR_REVERT] erscheinen innerhalb des Stadtradius einer eroberten Stabt.
TEXT.Italian: Le unità di [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Partigiani[COLOR_REVERT] appariranno intorno a una città appena catturata.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Seguidores[COLOR_REVERT] aparecerán dentro del radio de una ciudad capturada.
TEXT.Polish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Partyzanci[COLOR_REVERT] pojawiają się w zasięgu miasta przy przejmowaniu wrogiego miasta.

TEXT.English: Pasdaran

The Army of the Guardians of the Islamic Revolution often called Revolutionary Guards or Iranian Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) by the English-speaking or U.S. media, is a branch of Iran's Armed Forces, founded after the Iranian revolution on 5 May 1979. Whereas the regular military (artesh) defends Iran's borders and maintains internal order, according to the Iranian constitution, the Revolutionary Guard (pasdaran) is intended to protect the country's Islamic system. The Revolutionary Guards state that their role in protecting the Islamic system is preventing foreign interference as well as coups by the military or "deviant movements".
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pasdaran[COLOR_REVERT] is a Iranian unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pasdaran[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Iranienne unique.

TEXT.English: Pastene

The trademark Valdivia piece is the "Venus" of Valdivia: feminine ceramic figures. The "Venus" of Valdivia likely represented actual people, as each figurine is individual and unique, as can be seen by the hairstyles. They were made joining two rolls of clay, leaving the lower portion separated as legs and making the body and head from the top portion. The arms were usually very short, and in most cases were bent towards the chest, holding the breasts or under the chin.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pastene[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Patagonian Archer

The bow and arrow appears around the transition from the Upper Paleolithic to the Mesolithic. At the site of Nataruk in Turkana, Kenya, obsidian bladelets found embedded in a skull and within the thoracic cavity of another skeleton, suggest the use of stone-tipped arrows as weapons. After the end of the last glacial period, use of the bow seems to have spread to every inhabited continent, including the New World, except for Australia.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Patagonian Archer[COLOR_REVERT] is a Alacalufe unique unit.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer Patagonien[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Alacalufe unique.

TEXT.English: Patamar

The Patamar (Portuguese), (English: Pattamar, Patimar, French: Patemar, Patmar), is a type of Indian Dhow. It was traditionally used in the western coast of the Indian subcontinent as a cabotage vessel between Gujarat and Ceylon, usually for the transport of rice. Some can still be seen on the Malabar Coast.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Patamar[COLOR_REVERT] is a Bangladesh unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Patamar[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Bangladesh unique.

TEXT.English: Patrols

In response to the steady organization of criminal enterprises, rigid Patrol units begin to form as a pseudo-military branch of the government. With upgraded weaponry, this new breed of law enforcement is ready to take down all offenders.
Use Patrols to get a better handle on crime, local criminals, and to help defend the city.
TEXT.French: Utilisez les Patrouilleurs pour mieux maîtriser la criminalité, les bandits locaux, et pour aider à défendre la ville.

TEXT.English: George Patton

George Smith Patton, Jr. (also George Smith Patton III) (November 11, 1885 December 21, 1945) was a distinguished though controversial United States Army officer. It was in World War II that he made his mark, commanding both corps and armies as a general in North Africa, Sicily, and the European Theater of Operations. Near the end of the Sicilian campaign, Patton jeopardized his career by slapping a soldier recuperating from "battle fatigue" at a hospital; Patton considered him a coward. The well-publicized incident caused General Eisenhower to relieve him of command. Thus, instead of playing a major part in the invasion of Normandy, he was relegated to being a decoy. However, he was later given command of the U.S. Third Army and ably led it in breaking out of the hedgerows of Normandy and across France. When a surprise major German offensive resulted in American units being surrounded in Bastogne, Patton rapidly disengaged his army from fighting in another sector and moved it over 100 miles in 48 hours to relieve the siege. Regardless, he is considered to be one of the greatest American military commanders of all time.
TEXT.Polish: George Smith Patton, Jr. (ur. 11 listopada 1885 w San Gabriel w stanie Kalifornia, zm. 21 grudnia 1945 w Heidelbergu w Niemczech)? amerykański generał okresu II wojny światowej. Był postacią bardzo kontrowersyjną już za życia, budził skrajne uczucia zarówno u swoich podwładnych, jak i u przełożonych. Wśród swoich żołnierzy znany był jako "Old blood and guts". Znakomity kawalerzysta i szermierz (napisał m.in. instrukcję szermierczą dla kawalerii amerykańskiej), namiętnie grywał w polo. Opowiadał o swoich bardzo realistycznych wizjach wcześniejszych wcieleń. Wierzył w reinkarnację, uważał się m.in. za wcielenie kartagińskiego żołnierza, rzymskiego legionisty, napoleońskiego generała i wielu innych postaci. Patton zmarł 21 grudnia 1945 w szpitalu w Heidelbergu w wyniku obrażeń odniesionych w wypadku samochodowym, który miał miejsce 9 grudnia 1945.

TEXT.English: The American military hero is [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]George Patton[COLOR_REVERT]. Available in the modern era, he starts off with a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lieutenant[COLOR_REVERT] in his retinue. He can be built once [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Radio[COLOR_REVERT] are researched.
TEXT.French: Le Héros militaire Américain est [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]George Patton[COLOR_REVERT]. Disponible à l'Ere moderne, il commence avec un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lieutenant[COLOR_REVERT] dans sa suite. Il peut être construit lorsque [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialisation[COLOR_REVERT] et [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Radio[COLOR_REVERT] sont recherchés.
TEXT.Spanish: El héroe militar americano es [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]George Patton[COLOR_REVERT]. Disponible a partir de la Edad Contemporánea, comienza con el ascenso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Teniente[COLOR_REVERT] en su séquito. Puede ser entrenado una vez investigados el [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialismo[COLOR_REVERT] y la [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Radio[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Polish: Bohater Wojskowy Amerykanów to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]George Patton[COLOR_REVERT]. Rozpoczyna w towarzystwie [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Porucznika[COLOR_REVERT]. Może zostać wyszkolony wraz z odkryciem [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Uprzemysłowienia[COLOR_REVERT] i [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Radia[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Peacock

Peafowl are two Asiatic species of flying birds in the genus Pavo of the pheasant family, Phasianidae, best known for the male's extravagant eye-spotted tail, which it displays as part of courtship. The male is called a peacock, the female a peahen, and the offspring peachicks. The adult female peafowl is grey and/or brown. Peachicks can be between yellow and a tawny colour with darker brown patches. The term also embraces the Congo Peafowl, which is placed in a separate genus Afropavo.
TEXT.Polish: Paw (łc. pavo) zool. Pavo cristatus, duży ptak z rodziny bażantowatych (Phasianidae), pochodzący z Indii, Cejlonu i Pakistanu, którego samiec posiada charakterystyczny wachlarzowato rozkładany ogon (tren) złożony z b. mocno wydłużonych piór nadogonowych o metalicznym brązowozielonym połysku, zakończonych okiem w barwach czarnej, niebieskiej, zielonej i żółtej oraz barwny czubek na głowie; hodowany powszechnie jako ptak ozdobny.

TEXT.English: Pedro II Nkanga a Mvika
Pedro de Aguado

Pedro de Aguado (1513 or 1538 - late 16th or early 17th century) was a Spanish Franciscan friar who spent around 15 years in the New Kingdom of Granada, preaching to the Indians. During this time he collected source material for a history of the region, and began a manuscript, Recopilación historial, which he completed in Spain between 1576 and 1583 but was unable to publish. The manuscript was used by other historians, but was not published until the twentieth century.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pedro de Aguado[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pedro de Aguado[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité héroïque.

TEXT.English: Pedro de Alvarado

Pedro de Alvarado y Contreras was a Spanish conquistador and governor of Guatemala. He participated in the conquest of Cuba, in Juan de Grijalva's exploration of the coasts of the Yucatan Peninsula and the Gulf of Mexico, and in the conquest of Mexico led by Hernan Cortés. He is considered the conquistador of much of Central America, including Guatemala, Honduras and El Salvador. Although renowned for his skill as a soldier, Alvarado is known also for the cruelty of his treatment of native populations, and mass murders committed in the subjugation of the native peoples of Mexico.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pedro de Alvarado[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pedro de Alvarado[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité héroïque.

TEXT.English: Pedro II Nkanga a Mvika was a ruler of the kingdom of Kongo during the kingdom's first conflict with the Portuguese colony of Angola. He was the founder of the royal House of Nsundi and could trace his descent to one of Afonso I's daughters. Pedro II served in the provincial government of Manikongo Alvaro III Nimi a Mpanzu as Marquis of Wembo and later as Duke of Mbamba. Manikongo Alvaro III had no heir apparent as he was a young man with older uncles whom wished to rule. When he died in 1622, Pedro II was elected as a compromise candidate. King Pedro II's father was from the province of Nsundi, where Pedro himself was born, and thus his royal house is known by that name or simply the Kinkanga kanda. Pedro was widely regarded as a virtuous man and a model Christian. The Jesuits, who had recently arrived in Kongo held him up as a paragon of Christian deportment. No sooner had he come to the throne than the governor of Angola, Joao Correia de Sousa, sent an army into Kongo claiming that he had the right to choose the mwenekongo. Besides that, de Sousa accused Pedro of harboring runaway slaves from Angola during his tenure as Duke of Mbamba. Fresh from a victory against Nambu a Ngongo, a southern neighbor of Kongo, a 20,000 strong Portuguese army with its Imbangala allies entered Mbamba and was met by the Duke at Mbumbi. Although the Duke's men fought bravely and scattered a portion of the Portuguese army, he was badly outnumbered having only his own small force and that of the Marquis of Mpemba who managed to join him. The Portuguese defeated and killed both nobles. They were later eaten by Portugal's Imbangala troops. Pedro II immediately declared Angola an enemy of the state and brought the main army down from Kongo to meet the invaders at Mbanda Kasi. The army of Kongo crushed the Portuguese and the Imbangala and forced them out of Kongo entirely. In the aftermath of this, anti-Portuguese riots broke out all over the kingdom and threatened its long established merchant community. Portuguese throughout the country were humiliatingly disarmed and even forced to give up their clothes. Pedro II set up camp at Mbana Kasi and wrote numerous letters of protest to Rome and the king of Spain (then also ruler of Portugal). As a result of these letters and protests by Portuguese merchants in Kongo and Angola, Joao Correia de Sousa was recalled in disgrace, and some 1,200 slaves were eventually returned from Brazil. Pedro, anxious not to alienate the Portuguese merchant community, and aware that they had generally remained loyal during the war, did as much as he could to preserve their lives and property, leading some of his detractors to call him "King of Portuguese". Pedro also wrote to the Dutch States General proposing that the newly formed West India Company assist him in an attack on Luanda, with the BaKongo attacking by land and the Dutch by sea. Although he died before this alliance could be affected, the steady alliance between Kongo and the Netherlands would persist, eventually coming to fruition in 1641 with the Dutch attack on Luanda.
TEXT.Polish: Pedro II Nkanga a Mvika był władcą królestwa Kongo podczas pierwszego konfliktu z portugalską kolonią w Angoli. Był założycielem królewskiej dynasti Nsundi i wywodził swoje pochodzenie od jednej z córek Alfonsa I. Pedro II służył w prowincjonalnym rządzie Manikongo Alvaro III Nimi a Mpanzu jako markiz Wembo a później diuk Mbamba. Manikongo Alvaro III nie miał bezpośrednich potomków miał za to starszych wujków, którzy pragnęli władzy. Kiedy zmarł w 1622, Pedro II został wybrany jako kandydat kompromisowy. Pedro był uważany za dzielnego człowieka i przykładnego chrześcijanina.

TEXT.English: The Kongolese military hero is [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pedro II Nkanga a Mvika[COLOR_REVERT]. Available in the renaissance era, he starts off with a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bodyguard[COLOR_REVERT] in his retinue. He can be built once [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Divine Right[COLOR_REVERT] are researched.
TEXT.French: Le Héros militaire Congolais est [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pedro II Nkanga a Mvika[COLOR_REVERT]. Disponible à la Renaissance, il commence avec un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Garde du corps[COLOR_REVERT] dans sa suite. Il peut être construit lorsque [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] et [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Droit divin[COLOR_REVERT] sont recherchés.
TEXT.Spanish: El héroe militar congoleño es [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pedro II Nkanga a Mvika[COLOR_REVERT]. Disponible a partir del Renacimiento, comienza con el ascenso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guardia real[COLOR_REVERT] en su séquito. Puede ser entrenado una vez investigadas la [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Educación[COLOR_REVERT] y el [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Derecho divino[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Polish: Bohater Wojskowy Kongijczyków to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pedro II Nkanga a Mvika[COLOR_REVERT]. Rozpoczyna w towarzystwie [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ochroniarza[COLOR_REVERT]. Może zostać wyszkolony wraz z odkryciem [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Edukacji[COLOR_REVERT] i [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Prawa Boskiego[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Pen Huo Qi

The Pen Huo Qi is a double-piston pump naphtha flamethrower used in 919 CE in China, during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period. The flamethrower was carefully documented and illustrated in the Chinese military manual known as the Wujing Zongyao, compiled in the year 1044 AD during the Song Dynasty. Among various descriptions of equipment and components of the device, the book also provided instructions for how to keep up maintenance and repair of double-piston flamethrowers.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pen Huo Qi[COLOR_REVERT] is a Tang unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pen Huo Qi[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Tang unique.

TEXT.English: Perahu

Perahu was king of Punt, his wife was Queen Ati. The majority opinion places Punt in Eastern Africa, based on the fact that the products of Punt (as depicted in the Hatshepsut illustrations) were abundantly found in the Horn of Africa but were less common or sometimes absent in Arabia. These products included gold and aromatic resins such as myrrh, and ebony; the wild animals depicted in Punt include giraffes, baboons, hippopotami, and leopards. Says Richard Pankhurst: "[Punt] has been identified with territory on both the Arabian and the Horn of Africa coasts. Consideration of the articles which the Egyptians obtained from Punt, notably gold and ivory, suggests, however, that these were primarily of African origin. This leads us to suppose that the term Punt probably applied more to African than Arabian territory."
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Perahu[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Immortal
Pericles

Pericles was the most prominent and influential Greek statesman, orator and general of Athens during the Golden Age-specifically, the time between the Persian and Peloponnesian wars. He was descended, through his mother, from the powerful and historically influential Alcmaeonid family.
TEXT.Polish: Perykles (ur. ok. 495 p.n.e., zm. 429 p.n.e.) - ateński polityk, mówca (ta umiejętność była konieczna do osiągnięcia sukcesu politycznego), reformator ateńskiej demokracji. Syn zwycięzcy spod Mykale Ksantipposa, ze strony matki Agaristy wywodził się z rodu Alkmeonidów. Paradoksalnie, mimo że władza w polis skupiona była w jego rękach, to on stworzył demokrację ateńską. Wystąpił w roku 463 p.n.e. jako oskarżyciel Kimona, obalił z Efialtesem 462 p.n.e. Areopag, przez zaprowadzenie diet dla sędziów itd. dał ludowi większy udział w sprawach państwowych i utwierdził umiarkowaną demokrację. W latach 444 - 429 p.n.e., obalając swego konserwatywnego przeciwnika Tukidydesa, był wybierany corocznie na stanowisko stratega czyli dowódcy wojskowego mającego jednocześnie wpływ na politykę Aten. Rozszerzył i wzmocnił ustrój demokratyczny, otaczał opieką filozofów i artystów. Zaoszczędzone pieniądze przeznaczał na budowę wspaniałych gmachów (Partenon 447 - 438 p.n.e., Propyleje).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pericles[COLOR_REVERT] was a "Hero".
Persian Poet

So strong is the Persian aptitude for versifying everyday expressions that one can encounter poetry in almost every classical work, whether from Persian literature, science, or metaphysics. In short, the ability to write in verse form was a pre-requisite for any scholar. For example, almost half of Avicenna's medical writings are in verse.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Persian Poet[COLOR_REVERT] is a Saffarid unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Poète perse[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Saffaride unique.

TEXT.English: Peruvian Conquistador

Atahualpa, the last Sapa Inca became emperor when he defeated and executed his older half-brother Huascar in a civil war sparked by the death of their father, Inca Huayna Capac. In December 1532, a party of conquistadors led by Francisco Pizarro defeated and captured the Inca Emperor Atahualpa in the Battle of Cajamarca. The Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire was one of the most important campaigns in the Spanish colonization of the Americas. After years of preliminary exploration and military conflicts, it was the first step in a long campaign that took decades of fighting but ended in Spanish victory and colonization of the region known as the Viceroyalty of Peru with its capital at Lima, which became known as "The City of Kings". The conquest of the Inca Empire led to spin-off campaigns throughout the viceroyalty as well as expeditions towards the Amazon Basin as in the case of Spanish efforts to quell Amerindian resistance. The last Inca resistance was suppressed when the Spaniards annihilated the Neo-Inca State in Vilcabamba in 1572.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Peruvian Conquistador[COLOR_REVERT] is a Peruvian unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Conquistador péruvien[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Péruvienne unique.

TEXT.English: Peshmerga

Peshmerga are the military forces of the autonomous region of Iraqi Kurdistan. Peshmerga means "one who confronts death" or "one who faces death". "Pesh" means to stand in front of (loosely translated as to confront or face) while "merga" means death. The overall formal head of the peshmerga is the President of Iraqi Kurdistan. The peshmerga force itself is largely divided and controlled separately by the Democratic Party of Kurdistan and the Patriotic Union of Kurdistan, although both pledge allegiance to the Kurdistan Regional Government. Efforts are under way to gather the entire force under the Ministry of Peshmerga Affairs. Peshmerga forces are responsible for defending the land, people and institutions of the Kurdistan Region.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Peshmerga[COLOR_REVERT] is a Kurdish unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Peshmerga[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Kurde unique.

TEXT.English: Peter Claver

Saint Peter Claver, S.J was a Spanish Jesuit priest and missionary born in Verd?(Catalonia) who, due to his life and work, became the patron saint of slaves, the Republic of Colombia and ministry to African Americans. During the 40 years of his ministry in Colombia it is estimated he personally baptized around 300,000 people. He is also patron saint for seafarers. He is considered a heroic example of what should be the Christian praxis of love and of the exercise of human rights.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Peter Claver[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Petra Guard

Petra is a historical and archaeological city in the southern Jordanian governorate of Ma'an that is famous for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system. Another name for Petra is the Rose City due to the color of the stone out of which it is carved. Established possibly as early as 312 BC as the capital city of the Arab Nabataeans, it is a symbol of Jordan, as well as Jordan's most-visited tourist attraction. It lies on the slope of Jebel al-Madhbah (identified by some as the biblical Mount Hor) in a basin among the mountains which form the eastern flank of Arabah (Wadi Araba), the large valley running from the Dead Sea to the Gulf of Aqaba. Petra has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 1985.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Petra Guard[COLOR_REVERT] is a Nabateans unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Garde de Petra[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Nabatéenne unique.

TEXT.English: Petyhorcy

Petyhorcy was a type of 16-18th century medium-armoured cavalry in Great Duchy of Lithuania and Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. Initially it was formed from Circassians who came to Lithuania from under the rule of the Russian Tsardom (and hence were sometimes referred to simply as Czerkiesi - Circassians). The name is a corrupted Russian-language reference to a region of "Pyatigorye" ("Five Mountains", Beshtau) in Caucasus, which corresponds to the city of Pyatigorsk.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Petyhorcy[COLOR_REVERT] is a Lithuanian unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Petyhorcy[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Lithuanienne unique.

TEXT.English: Pheasant

Pheasants refer to some members of the Phasianinae (Horsfield, 1821) subfamily of Phasianidae in the order Galliformes.[PARAGRAPH:2]Pheasants are characterised by strong sexual dimorphism, males being highly ornate with bright colours and adornments such as wattles and long tails. Males are usually larger than females and have longer tails. Males play no part in rearing the young. Pheasants typically eat seeds and some insects.[PARAGRAPH:2]The best-known is the Common Pheasant, which is widespread throughout the world in introduced feral populations and in farm operations. Various other pheasant species are popular in aviaries, such as the Golden Pheasant (Chrysolophus pictus).
TEXT.German: Fasane (Phasianus colchicus) gehören zur Ordnung der Hühnervögel. Fasane weisen einen deutlichen Sexualdimorphismus auf. Während die Hähne ein farbenprächtiges Gefieder zur Schau tragen, sind Hühner eher unauffällig braun gefärbt, wodurch sie sich aber auch besser tarnen können. Fasanenhähne verfügen außerdem über lange, spitze Schwanzfedern.[PARAGRAPH:2]Fasane stammen ursprünglich aus Mittel- oder Ostasien. Zu Jagdzwecken wurde der Vogel aber auch in Europa, den USA und anderen Teilen der Welt angesiedelt. Fasane leben in gemischten Landschaften, die ihnen sowohl genug Deckung, als auch offene Flächen zur Nahrungssuche bieten.[PARAGRAPH:2]Der Fasan wird als delikates Wildgeflügel geschätzt, seine Federn sind in vielen Kulturen als modische Accessoires begehrt.
TEXT.Polish: Bażant (Phasianus colchicus)? gatunek średniej wielkości, zasadniczo osiadłego (choć samce mogą koczować) ptaka z rodziny kurowatych (Phasianidae).[PARAGRAPH:2]Pierwotnie nie zamieszkiwał Europy poza deltą Wołgi. Był to ptak azjatycki zamieszkujący Kaukaz i Zakaukazie oraz pas od Iranu po Mandżurię, Chiny i północną część Półwyspu Indochińskiego. Introdukowany w całej Europie, Ameryce Północnej, Japonii, na Hawajach i w Nowej Zelandii. Nie odbywa wędrówek. Azja Środkowa i Południowo-Wschodnia była miejscem w którym dawniej dochodziło do powstawania i rozprzestrzeniania się różnych gatunków bażantowatych. Za rozprzestrzenienie tego ptaka na zachód był odpowiedzialny człowiek, który w czasach Starożytnej Grecji i Rzymu (3 300 lat temu) wprowadził go na tereny basenu Morza Śródziemnego, we Włoszech, Francji i Niemczech. Pod koniec średniowiecza doszło do kolejnej fali sztucznego wprowadzania. Wtedy to bażanty zaaklimatyzowały się w całej umiarkowanej strefie Europy, a także w Ameryce Północnej. Np. w Czechach znano go już w XI wieku. Antropogeniczna introdukcja powiodła się też w Japonii, Nowej Zelandii i na Hawajach. O tak dużym sukcesie zasiedlania i umiejętności przystosowania do nowych obszarów zadecydowała duża różnorodność warunków jakie panują na pierwotnych terenach zasięgu. Jest to zarazem jedyny kurak, który sztucznie odchowywany adaptuje się bez problemów do środowiska naturalnego.[PARAGRAPH:2]To największy polny grzebiący ptak Europy. Podobnie jak inne bażantowate ma charakterystycznie potężne nogi (dłuższe niż u kuropatwy), które pozwalają na szybkie i wytrwałe poruszanie się po ziemi. Występują tam ostrogi, a stopy zakończone są trzema palcami. Pazury są silne, ale tępo zakończone, w przeciwieństwie do ptaków drapieżnych. Służą bowiem do rozgrzebywania gleby i przyziemnej roślinności. Dziób ma specyficzny kształt - dość potężny, na zewnątrz lekko wypukły, a koniec górnej szczęki zachodzi nieco na dolną. Umożliwia to chwytanie i uśmiercanie ofiar. Samce są znacznie większe od samic z dłuższym, ostro zakończonym ogonem (do 50 cm) i kolorową szatą godową - najczęściej zielona głowa z metalicznym połyskiem i dwoma małymi czubkami, wokół oczu naga czerwona skóra o kształcie płatków, na szyi biała obroża o różnej szerokości. Rdzawo złote plecy z fioletowym połyskiem, pióra zakończone jasno. Pstre barki z łuskowym rysunkiem, przód brązowoczarny z połyskiem, pióra szaro zakończone. Brzuch czarny. Ogon żółtobrunatny, długi z czarnym pręgowaniem, znacznie wydłużony. Samica mniejsza, o barwach ochronnych - wierzch popielato-rudy o nieregularnym, poprzecznym jasno-ciemnym prążkowaniu, spód jaśniejszy, nieomal pozbawiony plam. Stosunkowo często występują osobniki ciemniejsze z przewagą barwy zielonej, fioletowej lub brunatnej. Młode ptaki wyglądają podobnie do dorosłej samicy, ale mają od niej krótszy ogon. Wielkością dorównuje kurze domowej. Podobnie jak ona, to ptak towarzyski, tworzy małe grupy. Wiek koguta poznaje się po ostrodze, która służy w czasie walk z innymi samcami. Na niej od 2 roku życia dochodzi jeden pierścień, aż do końca życia, zatem liczba przeżytych lat jest o jeden większa niż liczba pierścieni. Najstarszy bażant, którego zaobserwowanego miał 27 lat. Tak dokładne oznaczenie wieku osobnika jest rzadką możliwością w przypadku innych ptaków.

TEXT.English: Philibert Tsiranana

Philibert Tsiranana (18 October 1912 - 16 April 1978) was a Malagasy politician and leader, who served as the first President of Madagascar from 1959 to 1972. During the twelve years of his administration, the Republic of Madagascar enjoyed institutional stability that stood in contrast to the political turmoil many countries of the African mainland experienced in this period. This stability contributed to Tsiranana's popularity and his reputation as a remarkable statesman. Compared with the leaders of other developing countries of the time, his conduct appears honorable. Madagascar experienced moderate economic growth under his pragmatic socialist policies and came to be known as "the Happy Island." However, the democratization process was fraught with challenges and his term ultimately terminated in a political impasse that brought about the end of the democratic First Republic and ushered in the isolationist, Soviet-inspired socialist Second Republic.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Philibert Tsiranana[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Philip the Bold

Philip the Bold (French: Philippe le Hardi, Dutch: Filips de Stoute; 17 January 1342 - 27 April 1404, Halle) was Duke of Burgundy (as Philip II) and jure uxoris Count of Flanders (as Philip II), Artois and Burgundy (as Philip IV). The fourth and youngest son of King John II of France and his wife, Bonne of Luxembourg, Philip was the founder of the Burgundian branch of the House of Valois. His vast collection of territories made him the undisputed premier peer, and made his successors formidable rivals of the King of France.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Philip the Bold[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Philip the Bold[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité héroïque.

TEXT.English: Phoenician Bireme
TEXT.Spanish: Phonecian Bireme

TEXT.English: A bireme is an ancient oared warship (galley) with two decks of oars, probably invented by the Phoenicians. Long vessels built for military purposes had relatively high speed, meticulous construction, strength, and depending on the number of rows of oars, were called uniremes, biremes, triremes, quadriremes, etc.
TEXT.Polish: Diera, birema (łac. biremis) - galera fenicka, starogrecka, rzymska, początkowo wiosłowa, a następnie żaglowo-wiosłowa, z dwoma rzędami wioseł, budowana od ok. VII w. p.n.e. jako rozwinięcie konstrukcji monery.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Phonecian Bireme[COLOR_REVERT] is a Phoenican ship. It is far superior to anything else available at this time, but goes obsolete fast.
TEXT.French: Ces bâteaux sont les plus puissants disponible, mais très éphémères.
TEXT.Italian: Questo vascello è decisamente superiore alle altre navi del suo periodo, ma diventa obsoleta in fretta.
TEXT.Polish: Fenicka Birema to okręt fenicki. Jest potężniejszy niż inne statki z tego samego okresu, ale niestety szybko staje się przestarzały.

TEXT.English: Pibelman

Traditional Noongar people made a living by hunting and trapping a variety of game, including kangaroos, possums and wallabies; by fishing using spears and fish traps; as well as by gathering an extensive range of edible wild plants, including wattle seeds. Nuts of the zamia palm were something of a staple food, though it required extensive treatment to remove its toxicity, and for women may have had a contraceptive effect. Noongar people utilised quartz, replacing chert flint for spear and knife edges from 12,000 years ago, when the chert deposit was submerged by sea level rise during the Flandrian transgression.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pibelman[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Pictish Warrior

The Pictish Warrior is a unique unit of the Pict culture, equivalent to the Light Swordsman. This warpainted ('picti' is Latin for 'painted [ones]') savage 'barbarian' was a formidable opponent, doubly so in the rugged terrain of his familiar homeland. He was the reason that the Romans never conquered modern-day Scotland, and instead built Hadrian's and the Antonine Wall.
The Pictish Warrior is the Pict culture's equivalent of the Light Swordsman. It starts with the Formation I and Goad I promotions, and has the standard swordsman's bonus when attacking a city.
TEXT.Italian: Il guerriero pict sostituisce lo spadaccino leggero. Inizia con le promozioni Formazione I e Goad I, oltre ad avere i bonus standard degli spadaccini attaccando una città.

TEXT.English: Pier Gerlofs Donia

Pier Gerlofs Donia (c.1480 1520) was a Frisian warrior, pirate, and rebel. He is best known by his West Frisian nickname "Grutte Pier" ("Greate Pier" in the Old Frisian spelling), or by the Dutch translations "Grote Pier" and "Lange Pier", or, in Latin, "Pierius Magnus", which referred to his legendary size and strength. Pier's armed band, known as the Arumer Zwarte Hoop (English: Arumer Black Heap, as in "group/mass of"), were pirates mainly active against the Hollanders and Burgundians at sea. He managed to capture many English and Holland ships, mainly on the Zuider Zee (today's IJsselmeer). In the biggest battle of his career, in 1515, he captured 28 Dutch ships, which earned him the nickname "Cross of the Dutchmen". Pier was basically a guerilla leader, who sought revenge against the Habsburg Empire whose soldiers allegedly raped and killed his wife in 1515. Despite his successes, Pier could not turn the Burgundian/Habsburg tide and he retired, disillusioned, in 1519. His nephew, Wierd Jelckama took over the command of Piers forces. Pier died peacefully in his bed on 18 October 1520.
TEXT.Polish: Pier Gerlofs Donia (c.1480 1520) was a Frisian warrior, pirate, and rebel. He is best known by his West Frisian nickname "Grutte Pier" ("Greate Pier" in the Old Frisian spelling), or by the Dutch translations "Grote Pier" and "Lange Pier", or, in Latin, "Pierius Magnus", which referred to his legendary size and strength. Pier's armed band, known as the Arumer Zwarte Hoop (English: Arumer Black Heap, as in "group/mass of"), were pirates mainly active against the Hollanders and Burgundians at sea. He managed to capture many English and Holland ships, mainly on the Zuider Zee (today's IJsselmeer). In the biggest battle of his career, in 1515, he captured 28 Dutch ships, which earned him the nickname "Cross of the Dutchmen". Pier was basically a guerilla leader, who sought revenge against the Habsburg Empire whose soldiers allegedly raped and killed his wife in 1515. Despite his successes, Pier could not turn the Burgundian/Habsburg tide and he retired, disillusioned, in 1519. His nephew, Wierd Jelckama took over the command of Piers forces. Pier died peacefully in his bed on 18 October 1520.

TEXT.English: The Dutch military hero is [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pier Gerlofs Donia[COLOR_REVERT]. Available in the medieval era, he starts off with a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bandit[COLOR_REVERT] in his retinue. He can be built once [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Literature[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Guilds[COLOR_REVERT] are researched.
TEXT.French: Le Héros militaire Danois est [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pier Gerlofs Donia[COLOR_REVERT]. Disponible à l'ère médiévale, il commence avec un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bandit[COLOR_REVERT] dans sa suite. Il peut être construit lorsque [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Littérature[COLOR_REVERT] et [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Guildes[COLOR_REVERT] sont recherchés.
TEXT.Spanish: El héroe militar holandés es [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pier Gerlofs Donia[COLOR_REVERT]. Disponible a partir de la Edad Media, comienza con el ascenso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bandido[COLOR_REVERT] en su séquito. Puede ser entrenado una vez investigadas la [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Literatura[COLOR_REVERT] y los [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Gremios[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Polish: Bohater Wojskowy Holendrów to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pier Gerlofs Donia[COLOR_REVERT]. Rozpoczyna w towarzystwie [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bandyty[COLOR_REVERT]. Może zostać wyszkolony wraz z odkryciem [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Literatury[COLOR_REVERT] i [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Gildii[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Pikeman
Pioneer
[ICON_BULLET]+2 population to the city founded.
Build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pioneers[COLOR_REVERT] to expand your empire with new cities. City founded by Pioneer has already 4 population and some buildings.
TEXT.French: Construisez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pionniers[COLOR_REVERT] pour étendre votre empire avec de nouvelles villes. Une Ville fondée par un Pionnier compte déjà 4 habitants et quelques immeubles.
TEXT.Polish: [ICON_BULLET]Może porywać statki handlowe.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Może łupić złoto ze statków handlowych wroga.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Capture Merchant Ships [ICON_BULLET]Can Loot Gold From Merchant Ships
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut capturer des navires marchands [ICON_BULLET]Peut piller de l'or sur des navires marchands

TEXT.English: Piye

Piye (once transliterated as Piankhi; d. 721 BC) was a ancient Kushite king and founder of the Twenty-fifth dynasty of Egypt who ruled Egypt from 747 BCE to c.?722 BCE. He ruled from the city of Napata, located deep in Nubia, modern-day Sudan.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Piye[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Plasma Armor
TEXT.Polish: Czołg plazmowy w przeciwieństwie do zwykłego czołgu, ten strzela wiązkami plazmy zamiast wybuchowymi pociskami. Wieczni Rycerze używali go, by próbować włamać się do muzeum, żeby ukraść Zbroję Bitewną Toltecha. Ostatecznie czołg został zniszczony przez Gniewa.

TEXT.English: TBD
TEXT.Polish: Czołg Plazmowy nalezy do najsilniejszych pojazdów gąsięnicowych. Otrzymuje bardzo wysokie bonusy przeciwko jednostkom konnym oraz walczącym wręcz.

TEXT.English: This is the most powerful armor unit.
TEXT.French: Ceci est l'unité blindée la plus puissante.
TEXT.Spanish: Este es el blindado más poderoso.

TEXT.English: Plasmathrower
The Plasma thrower is an infantry unit that roasts its enemies with plasma, or superheated chemicals that have lost one or more of their electrons.
TEXT.Italian: Il lancia-plasma è un'unità di fanteria equipaggiata con armi al plasma o prodotti chimici sovrariscaldati, che hanno perso uno o più dei loro elettroni.
TEXT.Polish: Miotacz plazmy (karabin plazmowy) - prototypowa broń, skonstruowana dla UNATCO i MJ12. Wykorzystuje pociski z plastiku domieszkowanego substancjami magnetycznymi, podgrzewanego do uzyskania plazmy. Jest ona potem kierowana przy pomocy elektromagnesów do wyjścia lufy.

TEXT.English: The Plasma thrower is best used in forests and against cities, both of which burn well.
TEXT.French: Le lanceur Plasma est mieux utilisé dans les forêts et contre les villes, qui brûlent bien.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità esprime il meglio di sè nelle foreste e nelle città: entrambe bruciano bene!
TEXT.Polish: Miotacz Plazmy sprawdza się zarówno w walce z jednostkami wroga jak i przy wypalaniu lasów.

TEXT.English: PLO Fighter

The Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO) is an organization founded in 1964 with the purpose of the "liberation of Palestine" through armed struggle. It is recognized as the "sole legitimate representative of the Palestinian people" by over 100 states with which it holds diplomatic relations, and has enjoyed observer status at the United Nations since 1974. The PLO was considered by the United States and Israel to be a terrorist organization until the Madrid Conference in 1991. In 1993, the PLO recognized Israel's right to exist in peace, accepted UN Security Council resolutions 242 and 338, and rejected "violence and terrorism"; in response, Israel officially recognized the PLO as the representative of the Palestinian people.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]PLO Fighter[COLOR_REVERT] is a Palestinian unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Guerrier PLO[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Palestinienne unique.

TEXT.English: Plumed Archer

The natives of Central America had developed the bow and used it in combat. Their bow technology was not far advanced, however, in comparison to the Asian composite bow or English longbow. Archers could be ordered to wound when capture of enemies was more important than killing. Like all other Mayan warriors, archers wore distinctive costumes so commanders could distinguish their troops and place the right group where needed. The status of archers was low in comparison to other warrior ranks, so men of lower standing and skill entered their ranks. Men of status and ambition joined the ranks of the Eagle Warrior where they could have the opportunity to take captives. The better skilled and experienced bowmen became Elite Plumed Archers. They were especially important when absolute victory was required because they had the ability to kill enemies quickly and break enemy army morale under a barrage of well-aimed arrows.
TEXT.Italian: L'arciere piumato è un'unità unica della cultura huasteca che sostituisce l'arciere standard; oltre alle normali ailità di un arciere, ottiene anche la promozione Mobilità.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plumed Archer[COLOR_REVERT] is the unique Archer of the Huastec culture. It has a 50% bonus in City and Hill Defence, and starts with the Mobility promotion.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]L'arciere piumato[COLOR_REVERT] è l'unità unica della cultura huasteca. Ha un bonus del 50% alla difesa in città e sulle colline, oltre alla promozione Mobilità.

TEXT.English: Pocahontas

Pocahontas was the daughter of Powhatan, an important chief of the Algonquian Indians (the Powhatans) who lived in the Virginia region. Her real name was "Matoaka." "Pocahontas" was a nickname meaning "playful" or "mischievous one." Pocahontas is most famous for reportedly saving the life of English Captain John Smith. Throughout her short life (she died at the age of 22), however, she was important in other ways as well. Pocahontas tried to promote peace between the Powhatans and the English colonists. She even converted to Christianity and married John Rolfe, a Jamestown colonist, a union which helped bring the two groups together. Her untimely death in England hurt the chance for continued peace in Virginia between the Algonquians and the colonists. Still, for centuries after her death, she has been venerated by many Americans as a symbol of peace and harmony, as well as the Native American peoples in general.
TEXT.Polish: Pocahontas (ur. ok. 1595, zm. 21 marca 1617)? północnoamerykańska Indianka, której życie stało się kanwą dla wielu romantycznych historii. Nosiła imię Matoaka (Białe Piórko), natomiast Pocahontas (Mała Psotnica lub Łobuziak) było jej przydomkiem z okresu dzieciństwa. Była córką Powhatana, wodza Federacji Powhatańskiej, kontrolującego tereny obecnej Wirginii. Po małżeństwie z Johnem Rolfe'em przyjęła imię i nazwisko Rebecca Rolfe. Prawdopodobnie uratowała przed egzekucją kolonistę Johna Smitha, pojmanego w grudniu 1607 roku i skazanego przez Powhatanów na śmierć. Nie jest pewne, czy miała to być egzekucja czy rytualne przyłączenie kolonisty do plemienia, ani czy wydarzenie to? opisane wiele lat później przez samego Smitha rzeczywiście miało miejsce. Wiadomo jednak, że wielokrotnie odwiedzała kolonistów i dostarczała im żywność, a w styczniu 1609 roku ostrzegła Anglików, że jej ojciec zamierza ich zabić, gdy przyjdą do wioski na rozmowy w sprawie dostaw zboża. Od tamtej pory zamieszkała u bardziej sprzyjających Anglikom Potomaków. W kwietniu 1613 roku Pocahontas została ujęta przez kapitana Samuela Argalla z Jamestown. Anglicy chcieli wymienić ją na własnych ludzi przetrzymywanych przez Powhatana. Do wymiany nie doszło, jednak od tego momentu życie Pocahontas uległo radykalnej zmianie? nauczyła się angielskiego i została ochrzczona przez Aleksandra Whitakera, przyjmując imię Rebecca. Chociaż była już zaręczona z jednym z członków plemienia, Kokumem, za zgodą ojca i gubernatora Thomasa Dale'a wzięła 5 kwietnia 1614 roku ślub z młodym wdowcem, plantatorem tytoniu, Johnem Rolfe'em, przyjmując jednocześnie nazwisko męża. Małżeństwo nie stało się przyczyną wymiany jeńców, jednak zapewniło dość trwały pokój między kolonistami a plemieniem aż do śmierci Powhatana w 1618 roku. Pocahontas i John Rolfe mieli syna, urodzonego w 1615 roku, któremu nadano imię Thomas. W roku 1616 wyjechała z mężem i kilkoma Indianami do Anglii, m.in. po to, by zabiegać o fundusze na budowę chrześcijańskiej szkoły dla indiańskich i angielskich dzieci. Została tam obwołana indiańską księżniczką, co miało przekonać Europejczyków że Indie Zachodnie są bezpiecznym i przyjaznym miejscem, które bez obaw można kolonizować. Pokahontas spotkała się nawet z królem Jakubem I. W 1617 roku, w trakcie przygotowań do powrotu zmarła jednak na czarną ospę. Pochowano ją w Anglii przy kościele św. Jerzego w Gravesend.

TEXT.English: The Native American national hero is [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pocahontas[COLOR_REVERT], available in the renaissance era. She starts off with an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Adventurer[COLOR_REVERT] in her retinue. She can be built once [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Humanism[COLOR_REVERT] are researched.
TEXT.French: Le Héros national Amérindien est [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pocahontas[COLOR_REVERT], disponible à la Renaissance. Elle commence avec un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aventurier[COLOR_REVERT] dans sa suite. Elle peut être recrutée lorsque [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] et [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Humanisme[COLOR_REVERT] sont recherchés.
TEXT.Spanish: La heroína nacional amerindia es [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pocahontas[COLOR_REVERT], disponible a partir del Renacimiento. Comienza con el ascenso [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aventurero[COLOR_REVERT] en su séquito. Puede ser entrenada una vez investigadas la [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Educación[COLOR_REVERT] y el [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Humanismo[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Polish: Bohater Narodowy Irokezów to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pocahontas[COLOR_REVERT]. Rozpoczyna w towarzystwie [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Podróżnika[COLOR_REVERT]. Może zostać wyszkolony wraz z odkryciem [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Edukacji[COLOR_REVERT] i [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Humanizmu[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Plague Bringer

Codenamed The Plague Bringer, this missile is beyond the BBM, perfect for weakening a few enemies within one nuke. Using the latest in Genetic manipulation, these new viruses not only make people sick, killing them at an extremely accelerated rate, but can spread like a wild fire. The new and improved smog also contains concentrated sulphuric acid vapours to easily take down anything from a tank to a battleship. If the viral entities enter water, it will become polluted, killing all sea life and plugging up all natural vents such as oil deposits. WARNING: Viral clouds are subject to wind will spread to other plots and could cause the entire planet to be consumed by this virus if not taken care of immediately.
TEXT.German: Diese Rakete, die den Codenamen Pestbringer trägt, ist noch verheerender als die BBM. Sie ist perfekt dafür geeignet, den Gegner mit einem einzigen Schlag schwer zu schwächen. Die neuen Viren an Bord dieser Rakete nutzen die neuesten Erkenntnisse in der Genmanipulation. Sie lassen die Menschen nicht nur erkranken und extrem schnell sterben, sie verbreiten sich auch noch wie ein Lauffeuer. Der neue, verbesserte Nebel enthält konzentrierte Schwefelsäuredämpfe, die alles vom Panzer bis zum Schlachtschiff zerlegen. Wenn die Viren ins Wasser geraten, wird es verseucht, wodurch alle Tiere sterben und alle natürlichen Rohstoffvorkommen, wie Ölquellen, vernichtet werden. ACHTUNG: Die Virenwolken können vom Wind abgetrieben werden und damit auch Gebiete befallen, die eigentlich nicht zerstört werden sollten. Mit dieser Waffe kann leicht der ganze Planet entvölkert werden, wenn den Viren nicht schnell Einhalt geboten wird.
TEXT.Italian: Con il nome in codice Plague Bringer, questo missile è oltre la MMB, perfetto per indebolire alcuni nemici con una sola bomba. Usano i più recenti ritrovati nella manipolazione genetica, questi virus non solo fanno ammalare le persone (uccidendole a un ritmo molto veloce), ma possono diffondersi come un fuoco incontrollato. Il nuovo smo contiene vapori di acido solforico concentrato per distruggere facilmente tutto, da un carro armato a una corazzata. Se i virus entrano in acqua essa viene contaminata, uccidendo la vita marina e distruggendo le correnti marine e i depositi petroliferi. ATTENZIONE: Le nuvole virali sono soggette ai venti e possono espandersi ad altre caselle, facendo consumare tutto il pianeta da questo virus se non vengono presi provvedimenti immediati.

TEXT.English: TBD
BBM

The BBM, or Biological Ballistic Missile, is the next step up from the Biological Missile. This missile can be considered a nuke by it's devastating effects that it unleashes upon impact. Using genetic manipulation, the artificial viruses contained within make beings sick beyond anything they have ever experienced before all while the synthetic smog protects the viruses from the sun and also contains Hydrochloric Acid vapours to eat away at metal simultaneously. If the viral entities enter water, it will become polluted, killing all sea life and plugging up all natural vents such as oil deposits. WARNING: Viral clouds are subject to wind and may spread to other plots and may cause entire continents to be consumed if not taken care of.
TEXT.German: Die BBM (Biological Ballistic Missile) ist eine ballistische, mit Biowaffen bestückte Rakete und damit die Weiterentwicklung der Biorakete. Wenn man die verheerenden Schäden betrachtet, die diese Rakete beim Einschlag anrichtet, kann sie durchaus mit einer Atombombe gleichgesetzt werden. Die künstlichen Viren an Bord nutzen genetische Manipulationen, um die Menschen schlimmer als jemals zuvor erkranken zu lassen. Der synthetische Nebel schützt die Viren vor der Sonne und zerstört gleichermaßen das im Umfeld befindliche Metall. Wenn die Viren ins Wasser geraten, wird es verseucht, wodurch alle Tiere sterben und alle natürlichen Rohstoffvorkommen, wie Ölquellen, vernichtet werden. ACHTUNG: Die Virenwolken können vom Wind abgetrieben werden und damit auch Gebiete befallen, die eigentlich nicht zerstört werden sollten. Diese Seuche ist in der Lage, ganze Kontinente zu entvölkern, wenn ihr kein Einhalt geboten wird.
TEXT.Italian: La MMB, o Missile Biologico Balistico, è il miglioramento del missile biologico. Questo missile può essere considerato una bomba atomica per gli effetti devastanti che causa all'impatto. Usando la manipolazione genetica, i virus artificiali contenuti causano malattie peggiori di qualunque mai vista prima, tutto mentre lo smog sintetico protegge i virus dal sole e corrode il metallo. Se il virus entra in contatto conl'acqua la inquina, uccidendo la vita marina distruggendo le correnti marine e i depositi petroliferi. ATTENZIONE: Le nuvole virali sono soggette ai venti e possono espandersi su altre caselle.
TEXT.Polish: The BBM, or Biological Ballistic Missile, is the next step up from the Biological Missile. This missile can be considered a nuke by it's devastating effects that it unleashes upon impact. Using genetic manipulation, the artificial viruses contained within make beings sick beyond anything they have ever experienced before all while the synthetic smog protects the viruses from the sun and eats away at metal simultaneously. If the viral entities enter water, it will become polluted, killing all sea life and plugging up all natural vents such as oil deposites. WARNING: Viral clouds are subject to wind and may spread to other plots.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]BBM[COLOR_REVERT] is a powerful biological "nuke". Much more powerful than normal [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Biological Missile[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile Ballistique Biologique[COLOR_REVERT]est un puissant "nucléaire" biologique. Beaucoup plus puissant que le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile biologique[COLOR_REVERT] normal.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Poison Mastery: %D1_Amount%% Modifier to all Afflict Attempts.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Maîtrise des Poisons: %D1_Amount%% Modif. pour toutes les tentatives d'Affliction.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Maestria dei veleni: %D1_Amount%% a tutti i tentativi di Afflizione.
TEXT.Polish: [ICON_BULLET]Trucizna: %D1_Amount%% do Modyfikatora założenia Osłabienia przy wszystkich próbach

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Poison Mastery: %D1_Amount%% Modifier to all Afflict probabilities from this unit.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Maîtrise du poison: modificateur %D1_Amount%% à toutes les probabilités d'affliction de cette unité
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Maestria dei veleni: %D1_Amount%% alle probabilità di Afflizione da parte di questa unità.
TEXT.Polish: [ICON_BULLET]Trucizna: %D1_Amount%% modyfikator ze wszystkich prawdopodobieństw do zatrucia od tej jednostki.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Poison Mastery: %D1_Amount%%
[ICON_BULLET]Weak Poisoner: %D1_Amount%% Modifier to all Afflict Attempts.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Poison faible: %D1_Amount%% Modif. pour toutes les tentatives d'Affliction.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Avvelenatore debole: %D1_Amount%% a tutti i tentativi di Afflizione.
TEXT.Polish: [ICON_BULLET]Słaba Trucizna: %D1_Amount%% do Modyfikatora założenia Osłabienia przy wszystkich próbach

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Watered Down Poison: %D1_Amount%% Modifier to all Afflict probabilities from this unit.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Poison dilué : %D1_Amount%% Modificateur de toutes les probabilités d'affliction de cette unité.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Veleno diluito: %D1_Amount%% alle probabilità di Afflizione da parte di questa unità.
TEXT.Polish: [ICON_BULLET]Osłabiona Trucizna: %D1_Amount%% modyfikator ze wszystkich prawdopodobieństw do zatrucia od tej jednostki.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Watered Down Poison: %D1_Amount%%
Polar Bear

The polar bear (Ursus maritimus) is a carnivorous bear whose native range lies largely within the Arctic Circle, encompassing the Arctic Ocean, its surrounding seas and surrounding land masses. It is a large bear, approximately the same size as the omnivorous Kodiak bear (Ursus arctos middendorffi). A boar (adult male) weighs around 350 - 700 kg (770 - 1,540 lb), while a sow (adult female) is about half that size. Although it is the sister species of the brown bear, it has evolved to occupy a narrower ecological niche, with many body characteristics adapted for cold temperatures, for moving across snow, ice, and open water, and for hunting the seals which make up most of its diet. Although most polar bears are born on land, they spend most of their time at sea. Their scientific name means "maritime bear", and derives from this fact. Polar bears hunt their preferred food of seals from the edge of sea ice, often living off fat reserves when no sea ice is present.
TEXT.Polish: Niedźwiedź polarny, niedźwiedź biały (Thalarctos maritimus) - gatunek dużego ssaka drapieżnego z rodziny niedźwiedziowatych, zamieszkującego Arktykę. Jest drapieżnikiem szczytowym w zasięgu swojego występowania. Grube futro i warstwa tłuszczu chronią go przed zimnem. Włosy tworzące sierść niedźwiedzia są półprzezroczyste; sierść jako całość ma zazwyczaj kolor biały lub kremowy, przez co umożliwia zwierzęciu dobry kamuflaż. Skóra ma barwę czarną. Niedźwiedź polarny ma krótki ogon i małe uszy, co pomaga mu redukować utratę ciepła. Stosunkowo mała głowa i długie, zwężające się ku tyłowi ciało nadają mu opływowy kształt przydatny do pływania. Jest ssakiem prowadzącym niemal morski tryb życia, potrzebującym do przetrwania jedynie kawałka pływającego lodu i żywności znajdowanej w wodzie, oraz miejsca do urodzenia i odchowania młodych. Jego systematyczna (łacińska) nazwa Ursus maritimus oznacza "niedźwiedź morski". Przystosował się do życia na lądzie, morzu i lodzie.

TEXT.English: Police APC
Police APC is a multi-role light armoured personnel carrier that can used for police forces, armored troops, peacekeeping and anti-terrorism.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Police APC[COLOR_REVERT] is a stay-at-home unit that is good at preventing internal unrest.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Blindé APC de Police[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité maintien de l'ordre efficace pour prévenir les troubles internes.
TEXT.Italian: L'APC della polizia è ottimo per combattere l'instabilità cittadina.
TEXT.Polish: Policyjny Transporter to silniejsza wersja Samochodu Policyjnego.

TEXT.English: Police Car

A police car is a ground vehicle used by police, to assist with their duties in patrolling and responding to incidents. Typical uses of a police car include transportation for officers to reach the scene of an incident quickly, to transport suspects, or to patrol an area, while providing a high visibility deterrent to crime. Some police cars are specially adapted for certain locations (e.g. work on busy roads) or for certain operations (e.g. to transport police dogs or bomb squads).
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Police Car[COLOR_REVERT] is a stay-at-home unit that is good at preventing internal unrest.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Véhicule de Police[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité de maintien de l'ordre efficace pour prévenir les troubles internes
TEXT.Italian: La macchina della polizia per combattere l'instabilità all'interno delle tue città.
TEXT.Polish: Samochód Policyjny świetnie radzi sobie z przestępcami i z tłumieniem zamieszek

TEXT.English: Police Dog
Police Dog, commonly referred to as a "K-9 dog" (which is a homophone of canine), is a dog that is trained specifically to assist police and other law-enforcement personnel in their work.
TEXT.Polish: Pies policyjny jest specjalnie tresowany towarzyszenia policjantom w pracy.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Police Dog[COLOR_REVERT] The traditional image of a police dog is one used to enforce public order by chasing and holding suspects, or detaining suspects by the threat of being released, either by direct apprehension or a method known as Bark and Hold. German Shepherd Dogs and Belgian Malinois are most commonly used because of their availability; however other dog breeds have also contributed, such as Dutch Shepherds, Rottweilers, Boxers, Doberman Pinschers, Giant Schnauzers, American Pit Bull Terriers, and American Staffordshire Terriers.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chien Policier[COLOR_REVERT]. L'image traditionnelle d'un chien policier est celui utilisé pour faire respecter l'ordre public par la chasse et l'apréhention des suspects.
TEXT.Spanish: La imagen tradicional de un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Perro policía[COLOR_REVERT] es su uso para mantener el orden público persiguiendo y reteniendo a sospechosos, o deteniéndolos bajo amenaza de soltarlos, mediante aprehensión directa o con un método conocido como "Ladra y retiene". Los pastores alemanes y los malinois belgas son los más comúnmente utilizados gracias a su disponibilidad; sin embargo también se entrenan otras razas como pastores holandeses, rottweilers, boxers, dóbermans, schnauzer gigantes, los American pit bull terriers, y los American Staffordshire terriers.
TEXT.Polish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pies Policyjny[COLOR_REVERT] wykorzystywany głównie do tropienia i ścigania przestępców oraz do wykrywania zabronionych czy nielegalnych substancji.

TEXT.English: Police Helicopter

Vertical flight has proven to be an invaluable tool for Law Enforcement, particularly in the larger cities. Police helicopters are not military attack vehicles but are equipped with surveilance equipment and the capacity to track down offenders on the run and keep them in sight until ground forces can make an arrest.
Use Police Helicopters to help control crime and to assist in obtaining and keeping visibility on wanted criminals.
TEXT.French: Utilisez des hélicoptères de police pour aider à contrôler la criminalité et pour aider à obtenir et à garder la visibilité sur les criminels recherchés.

TEXT.English: Police Mech

Battle Armor, or their lighter Power Armor variety, are armored infantry. Battle armor's improved resilience, atmospheric containment, and firepower make it more effective than standard infantry in a variety of roles, but much more expensive. Battle armor first evolved from Exoskeletons during the Star League in the early twenty-eighth century, but did not come to prominence on the battlefield until Clan Wolf debuted the Elemental in the mid-twenty-ninth century. Inner Sphere armies began deploying battle armor in the mid-thirty-first century. These battlesuits were based off of Clan battle armor captured or salvaged during Operation REVIVAL.
TEXT.Italian: Unità per il controllo dei riottosi.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Police Mech[COLOR_REVERT] is an upgrade to the Police Car. It is the ultimate in policing technology Transhuman money can buy.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mech. de Police[COLOR_REVERT] est une mise à niveau de la voiture de police. C'est le nec plus ultra en matière de technologie policière.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mech della polizia[COLOR_REVERT] è un miglioramento della macchina della polizia; è l'ultimo ritrovato tecnologico per il controllo del crimine.
TEXT.Polish: Mech Policyjny to ostateczna wersja sił policyjnych chroniących Twoje miasta przed zalewem przestępczości.

TEXT.English: Pomare I
Pomare I, was the unifier and first king of Tahiti and founder of the Pomare dynasty and the Kingdom of Tahiti between 1788 - and 1791.
TEXT.Polish: Pomare I był pierwszy królem zjednoczonego Tahiti pod koniec XVIII wieku.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pomare I[COLOR_REVERT] was a "Hero".
Pomare IV

Pomare IV (28 February 1813 - 17 September 1877), more properly Aimata Pomare IV Vahine-o-Punuateraitua (otherwise known as Aimata - "eye-eater", after an old custom of the ruler to eat the eye of the defeated foe), was the Queen of Tahiti between 1827 and 1877. She was the fourth monarch of the Kingdom of Tahiti.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pomare IV[COLOR_REVERT] is hero unit.
Pombos

The Kongo region (modern day Angola, western Democratic Republic of the Congo, southern Republic of the Congo) exhibits a number of indigenous military systems, particularly by such kingdoms at Kongo and Ndongo. Recruitment, organization and special units. The bulk of the fighting hosts were made of up general purpose levies and volunteers, but most Kongo polities maintained a small core of dedicated soldiers- nucleus of a standing army. Special detachments and commands called lucanzos were also used for various missions, and one such under a commander called Kakula ka Kabasa was defeated by the Portuguese in 1586 when crossing a river. Other special troops sometimes used included elite scouting units, the pombos, who sometimes ran with, and kept up with horses when they were used in the region. The pombos also performed pursuit duties. "Light" and "heavy" troop types were recognized. The light troops were far more numerous, and relied more on individual skill and technique (dodging spears for example). The "heavies" were more disciplined and relied on stronger defensive weapons and formations.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pombos[COLOR_REVERT] is a spearman for Kongo. It fights better in the Jungle.
TEXT.French: Les Pombos sont des Lanciers du Kongo. Ils se battent mieux dans la Jungle.
TEXT.Italian: I Pombos sono i lancieri del Congo; combattono meglio nella giungla.
TEXT.Polish: Pombos to kongijska unikalna wersja włócznika. Świetnie radzi sobie w dżungli.

TEXT.English: Carrack
Power Armored Infantry

Battle Armor, or their lighter Power Armor variety, are armored infantry. Battle armor's improved resilience, atmospheric containment, and firepower make it more effective than standard infantry in a variety of roles, but much more expensive. Battle armor first evolved from Exoskeletons during the Star League in the early twenty-eighth century, but did not come to prominence on the battlefield until Clan Wolf debuted the Elemental in the mid-twenty-ninth century. Inner Sphere armies began deploying battle armor in the mid-thirty-first century. These battlesuits were based off of Clan battle armor captured or salvaged during Operation REVIVAL.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Power Armored Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] its first mech unit. With city attack bonus and bombard ability its ideal as siege unit.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infanterie Energétique[COLOR_REVERT] est la première unité mech. Avec le bonus d'attaque de la ville et la capacité de bombardement, son idéal comme unité de siège.

Poya Longspears

The Poyas were a subgroup of indigenous Tehuelche people living in the Andes of Llanquihue and Palena Province as well as on the southern shores of Nahuel Huapi Lake in present-day Argentina. The Jesuit priest Nicolas Mascardi divided the Poya language into two linguistically distinct groups the one spoken by the "comarcanos" of Nahuelhuapi and another one spoken further east as far away as to the Atlanctic Ocean.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Poya Longspears[COLOR_REVERT] is a Poya unique unit.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancier Poya[COLOR_REVERT] est une unité Poya unique.

TEXT.English: Po Ngbe

[H1]Po Ngbe [\H1][NEWLINE][BOLD]King of the Olmec[\BOLD][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Between 900-600 BC one of the major rulers at Guerrero was Po Ngbe. There is also an important tablet from Ahuelican, Guerrero of mottled green stone that also mentions King Po Ngbe, and his building of a great temple at his site.[PARAGRAPH:1]The Guerrero celt makes it clear that Po Ngbe was recognized as a member of the craftsmen caste. He was ruler of the place where these artifacts were found. This celt also makes it clear that Po Ngbe was probably buried in a pyramid. This view is supported by the Ahuelican, Guerrero Tablet. This artifact was made of the same stone as the Teo mask and the Guerrero celt. Recently a mask of Po Ngbe was recently discovered and published. The mask of Po Ngbe has an inscription written on the inside of the mask.[PARAGRAPH:1]In the first column of the Teo Mask inscription we read the following:[PARAGRAPH:2]"Cause (here) the conferring of all virtue to this very good abode. Admiration indeed (Oh) Governor. Indeed (you are) wonder. Thou (art) a spirit of tranquility. (Thou art like) the Jaguar (a master of the bush). Righteousness takes root here in this tomb of Na Po Ngbe. This habitation of the devotee (is) a habitation of propriety. Order (Na Po Ngbe) this object of respect to be an envoy on a mission (to) hold upright purity. He who is a powerful spirit (in) thine tomb. Righteousness takes root here (in your) tomb. [Na Po Ngbe] A boundless source of great spiritual tranquility (your) abode. The tomb is powerful. lay low (the celebrity) [in the tomb] to realize spiritual tranquility."
TEXT.Polish: Po Ngbe był władcą Olmeków pomiędzy 900 do 600 rokiem p.n.e.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Po Ngbe[COLOR_REVERT]is a "Hero".
Precision Attack Missile

Precision Attack Munition is used to attack vehicles, armor, bunkers, and other targets of opportunity. Uses 3 modes of guidance, GPS/INS, semi-active laser homing, and autonomous imaging infrared. Carries a multi-mode warhead effective against several types of targets. It also includes an online library of pictures of targets, so that it can visually identify what it is homing in on.

Reach out and crush someone with the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Precision Attack Missile[COLOR_REVERT], which provides a superior then [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Guided Missile[COLOR_REVERT] punch to any single tile within its range.
TEXT.French: Atteignez et écrasez votre adversaire avec le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile de Précision[COLOR_REVERT], qui fournit alors un choc bien supérieur au [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Missile guidé[COLOR_REVERT], sur n'importe quelle case de sa portée.
